author: deweese
msg: 1) Put in a fix for gradients on lines/points (really any geometry with
zero size in x or y).
2) Put in a fix for IndexOutOfBounds exceptions from fireFailedEvent
(It seems that interupting a thread that is in the middle of loading
a class does bad things on Solaris.  This seems to limit the damage.)
3) New reference image for flowText
4) New test for gradients, applying them to points.

author: vhardy
msg: Fixed regressions on ApplicationSecurityEnforcer following fix for no override of existing java.security.policy property

author: tkormann
msg: - add a new test (similar to linearGradientLine.svg) expect that's for
radial gradient which illustrates a bug in batik (so no reference
image since the bug is fixed)
